name: Gaze Into Fate
storyline:
The wilds are scarred by the endless cycle of war. It’s time for a change.

In a world that has always been the way it is, Tiiyao, a shaman and tribal leader, searches for knowledge and answers.

Communicate with your ancestors and experience an intense story in this approximately 60 minute game experience that will also make you search for answers. Why does the cycle of war never ends? Which is the right path? What is your fate in this world? Do we even have a choice?
summary: A meditative and story-driven puzzle game, where you must discover answers to decisions, we all have to make. Can you make a change in a world of endless wars?
